flavorText: As she shepherds the faithful, the angel's radiance is a shield of salvation.

foreignData.flavorText: Während er die Gläubigen behütet, dient das Strahlen des Engels als rettender Schild.
foreignData.name: Sichere Fahrt
foreignData.text: Verhindere allen Schaden, der dir und Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, in diesem Zug zugefügt würde.

foreignData.flavorText: Conforme pastorea a los fieles, el resplandor del ángel es un escudo de salvación.
foreignData.name: Pasaje seguro
foreignData.text: Prevén todo el daño que se te fuera a hacer a ti y a las criaturas que controlas este turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Berger des fidèles, l'ange diffuse une radiance qui fait office de bouclier salvateur.
foreignData.name: Passage protégé
foreignData.text: Prévenez toutes les blessures qui devraient être infligées à vous et aux créatures que vous contrôlez ce tour-ci.

foreignData.flavorText: Mentre guida i fedeli, il fulgore dell'angelo è uno scudo salvifico.
foreignData.name: Passaggio Sicuro
foreignData.text: Previeni tutto il danno che verrebbe inflitto a te e alle creature che controlli in questo turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 信仰深き者を導くとき、天使の放つ光は救いの盾となる。
foreignData.name: 安全な道
foreignData.text: このターン、あなたやあなたがコントロールするクリーチャーに与えられるすべてのダメージを軽減する。

foreignData.flavorText: 천사가 신자들을 옳은 길로 안내하니, 천사의 빛은 구원의 방패가 될지어다.
foreignData.name: 안전한 통행
foreignData.text: 이 턴에 당신 및 당신이 조종하는 생물이 입으려고 하는 모든 피해를 방지한다.

foreignData.flavorText: Enquanto conduz os fiéis, a radiância do anjo se torna um escudo de salvação.
foreignData.name: Passagem Segura
foreignData.text: Previna todo o dano que seria causado a você e às criaturas que você controla neste turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Сияние ангела спасительным щитом укрывает верную паству.
foreignData.name: Безопасный Проход
foreignData.text: Предотвратите все повреждения, которые должны быть нанесены вам и существам под вашим контролем в этом ходу.

foreignData.flavorText: 天使引领着忠诚信徒，所放射的光芒成为救赎之盾。
foreignData.name: 安全出路
foreignData.text: 于本回合中，防止将对你与由你操控之生物造成的所有伤害。

foreignData.flavorText: 天使引領著忠誠信徒，所放射的光芒成為救贖之盾。
foreignData.name: 安全出路
foreignData.text: 於本回合中，防止將對你與由你操控之生物造成的所有傷害。

name: Safe Passage
originalText: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control this turn.

rulings.text: Safe Passage prevents all damage, not just combat damage, that would be dealt to you and creatures you control this turn.
Safe Passage will prevent damage dealt to creatures that weren’t on the battlefield at the time it resolved.
Safe Passage doesn’t prevent damage that would be dealt to planeswalkers you control.
Safe Passage has no effect on damage that’s already been dealt.

text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control this turn.
